fields.summary: Container Launch fails with exitcode 2 with DefaultContainerExecutor

fields.description:
Please find the below NM log when the issue occurs.

ExitCodeException exitCode=127:

fields.summary: Container Launch fails with exitcode 127 with DefaultContainerExecutor

comments.body:
It is almost definitely an app-issue, closing this as invalid, please reopen if you disagree. If you want help debugging this, post this on the user lists.

I left YARN-3703 open to see if we can improve our error messages.
